SUBMITTER_NAME_NID.NATIONAL_ELECTION: Nomination Submitter's Name and Voter ID or NID
SUBMITTER_NAME_NID.CITY_CORPORATION_ELECTION: Nomination Submitter's Name and Voter ID or NID
SUBMITTER_NAME_NID.UPAZILLA_ELECTION: Nomination Submitter's Name and Voter ID or NID
SUBMITTER_NAME_NID.MUNICIPALITY_ELECTION: Nomination Submitter's Name and Voter ID or NID
SUBMITTER_NAME_NID.UNION_PARISHAD_ELECTION: Nomination Submitter's Name and Voter ID or NID

PARTY_NAME.CITY_CORPORATION_ELECTION: Name of the Political Party / Independent (Applicable only for Mayor's position)
PARTY_NAME.MUNICIPALITY_ELECTION: Name of the Political Party / Independent (Applicable only for Mayor's position)
PARTY_NAME.UNION_PARISHAD_ELECTION: Name of the Political Party / Independent (Applicable only for Chairman's position)

PROPOSER_NAME_NID.NATIONAL_ELECTION: Proposer's Name and Voter ID or NID
PROPOSER_NAME_NID.UPAZILLA_ELECTION: Proposer's Name and Voter ID or NID

SUPPORTER_NAME_NID.NATIONAL_ELECTION: Supporter's Name and Voter ID or NID
SUPPORTER_NAME_NID.UPAZILLA_ELECTION: Supporter's Name and Voter ID or NID

COLUMNS.CONSTITUENCY_NAME_AND_NUMBER: In the case of female members, the name of the Union or Municipal member or councillor from whose wards they are elected and the numbers of the respective wards
COLUMNS.NUMBER_OF_NOMINATIONS: Number of Nomination Papers on behalf of the person filing the Nomination Papers
